plan_details.plan_summary: The Bink loyalty programme, Rewards by Bink Test, offers members 1 point for every £1 spent in-store and online.
plan_details.plan_description: As you collect more points, you unlock increasing Rewards and benefits, from express alterations to at-home stylists – we’re talking serious perks here. These stackable services grow as you reach new tiers.
plan_details.redeem_instructions: Scan this barcode at the till to earn points if you do not have your linked Barclays card with you.

credentials.description: Should this box be on or off?
Should this box be on or off?
You'll usually find this in your Harvey Nichols app

plan_details.plan_summary: Rewards by Harvey Nichols is your fast track pass to exclusive benefits and complimentary services. Earn 1 point for every £1 spent on harveynichols.com, in-stores and dining at any of our establishments.
plan_details.plan_description: As your purchases inch you up the points ladder, you will unlock ever-increasingly spectacular rewards – think cases of premium wine or a private canape party hosted at the OXO Tower Restaurant. Our programme is the only one of its kind to offer a choice of rewards every 3 months, rather than once a year. The hardest part will be choosing which to redeem. Please note, Payment Linked Loyalty is currently not available in Harvey Nichols restaurants and online.
plan_details.redeem_instructions: Present the barcode to the cashier or use the card number to still earn points, if you are paying with cash or an unlinked payment card.

consents.description: Check this box for email marketing from Harvey Nichols - if you change your mind, you can opt out anytime via the retailer.

content.value: Please enter your details to register with the retailer. We won’t save or store any of the information you provide or edit.

plan_details.plan_summary: The Harvey Nichols loyalty programme, Rewards by Harvey Nichols, offers members 1 point for every £1 spent in-store and online.
plan_details.plan_description: As you collect more points, you unlock increasing Rewards and benefits, from express alterations to at-home stylists – we’re talking serious perks here. These stackable services grow as you reach new tiers.
plan_details.redeem_instructions: Scan this barcode at the till to earn points if you do not have your linked Barclays card with you.

plan_details.plan_summary: With Iceland’s Bonus Card programme, you can easily save and spend when you shop. Iceland will give you £1 for every £20 you save on your Bonus Card. Iceland makes saving easy with their Bonus Card programme.
plan_details.plan_description: At checkout, simply tell the cashier how much money you would like to save, present your digital Bonus Card within this app and scan it using the customer facing scanners, as you normally would with your physical card. You will also be able to see your savings balance on your phone. For every £20 you save, Iceland give you £1 absolutely free. Additional benefits include free home delivery when you spend over £25, and exclusive bonuses and offers only for Bonus Cardholders.
plan_details.redeem_instructions: At checkout, simply tell the cashier how much money you would like to save or redeem, present the barcode and scan it using the customer facing scanners, as you normally would with your physical card.
plan_details.plan_register_info: You have added a temporary card. You’ll need to register it to enjoy the full benefits of the programme.

plan_details.plan_summary: Use your linked payment cards every time you shop in a FatFace store or online at fatface.com to start earning Rewards. Each purchase gets you closer to a Reward Voucher. Once you have spent £100 you will receive a 15% Voucher to use online.
plan_details.plan_description: At this time FatFace Rewards is only available to Barclays customers.

consents.description: Check this box to receive Email Marketing from FatFace - if you change your mind, you can opt out anytime via the retailer.

Use the code below to get 15% off your next order at fatface.com. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer or purchase of gift cards. Discount applies to Full price stock only.

plan_details.plan_summary: Collect 7 stamps for a £7 OFF Meal Voucher. One stamp can be earned per customer per transaction when the qualifying spend in a single transaction for food & drink purchases totals £7.00 or more in a participating Wasabi store. Ts and Cs apply.
plan_details.plan_description:
Please note that your vouchers are single-use and cannot be used twice. Show your Wasabi Club reward code in store to redeem £7 off your next meal.
The voucher will be available to redeem 2 months from the date it is collected. This voucher is non-refundable and cannot be exchanged for cash in part or full and is valid for a single transaction only.
